You can schedule posts in advance, share a quote from an external article directly to your social feed, and share webpages, too. No need to access your HubSpot portal in another tab. Do it straight from your current webpage.</p> \n<a></a> \n<h2>Chrome Extensions for SEO</h2> \n<h3>1. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/seoquake/akdgnmcogleenhbclghghlkkdndkjdjc\">SEOQuake</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/seoquake-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=seoquake-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"SeoQuake Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n<h4>Users: 700K+</h4> \n<p>SEOQuake is a Chrome extension that allows SEO marketers to easily get insights about different websites without leaving their web browser. With one click, you can find search ranking and backlink information about the search results on a Google results page. It also provides details about the amount of backlinks the website has (according to SEMRush), shows you the keyword density of a page, and lists external and internal links.</p> \n<h3>2. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/check-my-links/ojkcdipcgfaekbeaelaapakgnjflfglf?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Check My Links</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/check-my-links-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=check-my-links-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Check My Links Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n<h4>Users: 200K+</h4> \n<p>Check My Links does what it says it will: It quickly scans web pages and shows you which links are working properly and which are broken. With this extension, marketers can ensure that their own websites are functioning properly for their visitors. Additionally, marketers can check for broken backlinks to their content on other websites. That way, they can <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/blog/tabid/6307/bid/32479/32-White-Hat-Ways-to-Build-Inbound-Links.aspx\">build backlinks</a> to their content and increase their domain authority.</p> \n<h3>3. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/nofollow/dfogidghaigoomjdeacndafapdijmiid/related?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">NoFollow</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/nofollow-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=nofollow-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"NoFollow Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n<h4>Users: 100K+</h4> \n<p>NoFollow quickly indexes web pages and identifies links that are coded with the no-follow<a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/how-to-unindex-pages-from-search-engines\"> metatag</a>. No-follow links aren't crawled by search engines and don't contribute to search engine authority, so SEOs can use this extension to determine if external sites are backlinking to them with followed, or indexed, links.</p> \n<p>Additionally, you might use no-follow links on web pages you don't want crawled, such as a landing page or thank you page, and this extension can easily double-check if you've coded links correctly. In the example screenshot below, no-follow links are highlighted in red.</p> \n<p><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/nofollow.png?width=582&amp;height=318&amp;name=nofollow.png\" alt=\"nofollow.png\" width=\"582\" height=\"318\" style=\"display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" /></p> \n<div> \n <h3>4. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ahrefs-seo-toolbar/hgmoccdbjhknikckedaaebbpdeebhiei?hl=en\">Ahrefs SEO Toolbar</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ahrefs-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=ahrefs-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Ahrefs Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 80K+</h4> \n <p>Ahrefs SEO Toolbar is an SEO tool that’s great for beginners and experts alike. Ahrefs SEO Toolbar is a Google Chrome plugin that lives in the search engine results page (SERP), so you can get SEO insights for every website and keyword, all while you Google search.</p> \n <p>Discover thousands of the best performing keywords to target for SEO &amp; PPC. Spy on your competitor’s Google Ads, Facebook, and Instagram ads, and find the best backlink opportunities.</p> \n <h3>5. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/impactana-content-marketi/gidhppoakegddkkpmgoejeadomghnkie?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Impactana</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/impactanaextensionesgooglechrome.jpeg?width=2436&amp;name=impactanaextensionesgooglechrome.jpeg\" alt=\"Impactana Chrome extension\" width=\"2436\" style=\"width: 2436px;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 2K+</h4> \n <p>Impactana's Chrome toolbar offers a wealth of SEO, social media, and content marketing information about any web page. Its two <a href=\"http://www.impactana.com/content-marketing-toolbar/\">biggest metrics</a> are \"Buzz,\" which measures a website's reach on social media, and \"Impact,\" which measures SEO metrics such as click-through rate, backlinks, and time on page. It also shares details like author and publisher contact information that are useful for PR professionals.</p> \n <h3>6. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/keyword-surfer/bafijghppfhdpldihckdcadbcobikaca\">Keyword Surfer</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/keyword-surfer-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=keyword-surfer-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Keyword Surfer Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 300K+</h4> \n <p>Keyword Surfer is just like the Arel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\" hrefs Chrome extension in that it gives you related keywords for your industry-related searches. You can see the monthly search volume for the keyword and generate an article outline that could potentially help you rank for the keyword. The tool also allows you to see the word count of competing pages and articles.</p> \n <h3>7. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/link-research-seo-toolbar/eagkigdnclikabndlojagifehppodooi\">Link Research SEO Toolbar</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/link-research-seo-toolbar.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=link-research-seo-toolbar.jpeg\" alt=\"Link Research SEO Toolbar Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 10K+</h4> \n <p>Link Research SEO Toolbar allows you to see the core metrics of a website and understand how well it performs against the competition. The Chrome extension is best paired with an active Link Research Tools subscription to get the most out of it.</p> \n <h3>8. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/seo-meta-in-1-click/bjogjfinolnhfhkbipphpdlldadpnmhc\">SEO META in 1 CLICK</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/seo-meta-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=seo-meta-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"SEO META in 1 CLICK Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 200K+</h4> \n <p>SEO META in 1 CLICK is a fantastic tool for seeing a website’s meta information in — you guessed it — a single click! No need to right-click, hit “View Page Source,” and read through line after line of code to see a website’s meta description. You can use this as a competitive research tool to see what your top-ranked competitors are putting in their meta descriptions.</p> \n <p>You can also use it to double-check that your website is optimized across the board. It even offers shortcuts to check the mobile friendliness of your website and analyze the keyword density of the page.</p> \n <h3>9. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/serpstat-website-seo-chec/fcgbopaomlpldhbinhgebmkcnkfconmn\">Serpstat Website SEO Checker</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/serpstat-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=serpstat-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Serpstat Website SEO Checker Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 20K+</h4> \n <p>Analyze your competitors’ performance with the Serpstat Website SEO Checker extension. When you sign up for a Serpstat account, you can also see the page’s top keywords and traffic.</p> \n <h3>10. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/seo-minion/giihipjfimkajhlcilipnjeohabimjhi\">SEO Minion</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/seo-minion-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=seo-minion-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"SEO Minion Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 100K+</h4> \n <p>SEO Minion allows you to carry out in-depth competitor research by giving you access to your competitor’s website metrics and data. You can also check for broken links, highlight all links, and preview how the page appears in the SERPs — all handy tools for examining your own webpages and articles and ensuring they’re in tip-top shape.</p> \n <a></a> \n <h3>1. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/onetab/chphlpgkkbolifaimnlloiipkdnihall?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">OneTab</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/onetab-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=onetab-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"OneTab Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 2M+</h4> \n <p>When you conduct research for a piece of content, it's easy to get swamped in multiple open tabs with great resources you want to cite. The trouble is, once it comes time to write and refer back to the sources, it's hard to navigate between all of the tabs. Luckily, OneTab lets you put multiple different URLs into a single tab for easy reference.</p> \n <h3>2. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/momentum/laookkfknpbbblfpciffpaejjkokdgca?hl=en&amp;__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Momentum</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/momentum-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=momentum-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Momentum Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 3M+</h4> \n <p>Momentum is a simple Chrome extension that replaces blank new tabs with beautiful photography, inspiring quotes, weather reports, and a space for you to write down a priority for the day when you open up your browser for the first time. (Don't worry — the temperature is in Celsius, it's not that cold in Boston.)</p> \n <h3>3. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/blank-new-tab-page/jonikckfpolfcdcgdficelkfffkloemh?hl=en&amp;__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Blank New Tab Page</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/blank-new-tab-page-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=blank-new-tab-page-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Blank New Tab Page Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 30K+</h4> \n <p>Blank New Tab Page is exactly what it sounds like — a completely blank, white page when you open a new tab in Chrome. Today's browser settings and themes — and new versions of Google Chrome — display previews of recently visited websites or a Google Search bar on new tabs when you open them. If all you want is a blank page to navigate somewhere new, this Chrome extension is what you're looking for.</p> \n <h3>4. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/infinity-new-tab-pro/nnnkddnnlpamobajfibfdgfnbcnkgngh?hl=en-US&amp;__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Infinity New Tab</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/infinity-new-tab-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=infinity-new-tab-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Infinity New Tab Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 400K+</h4> \n <p>Infinity New Tab includes a feature known as Speed Dial on every new tab you open in Chrome. This feature produces large icon-based shortcuts to your most frequently visited websites, as shown in the screenshot above. You can customize these icons with new websites as needed, and add productivity widgets like to-do lists to each new tab as well.</p> \n <h3>5. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/new-tab-page-by-startme/cfmnkhhioonhiehehedmnjibmampjiab?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Start.me</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/start-me-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=start-me-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Start.Me Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 70K+</h4> \n <p>With Start.me, you turn each new tab you open in Chrome into a personal dashboard. You can populate this dashboard with webpage bookmarks, productivity widgets, news feeds from specific websites, and various photos and videos. If you prefer to keep your daily schedule online, rather than in print or on your desktop, you might find this extension useful.</p> \n <h3>6. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/earth-view-from-google-ea/bhloflhklmhfpedakmangadcdofhnnoh?hl=en&amp;__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Earth View</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/earth-view-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=earth-view-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Earth View Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 900K+</h4> \n <p>This Chrome extension might not make your browsing experience easier, but it will make it prettier. Broaden your geography skills while surfing the internet at the same time with Earth View by Google. Each time you open a new tab, the first thing you'll see is a satellite image of a beautiful location somewhere on Earth. See some of the images that pop up on new tabs in the screenshot above.</p> \n <h3>7. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/infinite-new-tab-the-best/meffljleomgifbbcffejnmhjagncfpbd?hl=en&amp;__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Infinite New Tab</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/infinite-new-tab-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=infinite-new-tab-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Infinite Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 200K+</h4> \n <p>Not to be confused with \"Infinity New Tab\" (the fourth new tab extension on this list), this browser accessory turns your new tab into a canvas. Choose from more than 100 wallpapers to customize your new tab background, as well as a reminder list and note pad for staying on task.</p> \n <h3>8. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/homey-productivity-start/lllnjdmfnfjifcfpppjmcnanpokikcpl/related?hl=en\">Homey</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/homey-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=homey-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Homey New Tab Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 30K+</h4> \n <p>Homey is a relaxing and uncluttered new tab Chrome extension that turns your new tab page into a dashboard. You can see your city’s weather, access your bookmarks, or create a grid with your most-frequented websites. Alternatively, you can keep the dashboard clean and mess-free for a less overwhelming experience. Like most new tab Chrome extensions, it also gives you access to the search engine of your choice.</p> \n <h3>9. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/new-tab-redirect/icpgjfneehieebagbmdbhnlpiopdcmna\">New Tab Redirect</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/new-tab-redirect-chrome-extension-1.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=new-tab-redirect-chrome-extension-1.jpeg\" alt=\"New Tab Redirect Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 600K+</h4> \n <p>Got a website you always need to have open? This Chrome extension automatically opens a page of your choice when clicking on a new tab. The tool can even redirect to a specific file you have saved in Google Drive or elsewhere online.</p> \n <h3>10. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/speed-dial-fvd-new-tab-pa/llaficoajjainaijghjlofdfmbjpebpa\">Speed Dial</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/speed-dial-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=speed-dial-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Speed Dial Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 600K+</h4> \n <p>Speed Dial is a charmingly old-school Chrome extension that turns your new tab into a 3D dashboard. Access your bookmarks and more frequented sites in a dashboard that might just remind you of your MySpace days. Don’t let its design fool you: The extension is constantly updated for performance and user-friendliness.</p> \n <a></a> \n <h2>Chrome Extensions for Content Sourcing</h2> \n <p>Sometimes you just need a good <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/content-curation-tools\">content curation tool</a> to help you save important information while you’re researching or writing a blog post.</p> \n <h3>1. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/onenote-web-clipper/gojbdfnpnhogfdgjbigejoaolejmgdhk?hl=en\">OneNote Web Clipper</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/onenote-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=onenote-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"OneNote Web Clipper Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 1M+</h4> \n <p>Are you a OneNote user? Whether you're conducting research for a project or simply reading different articles online, you most likely come across resources that you want to save and return to for later use.</p> \n <p>That's where OneNote Web Clipper comes in. Instead of saving content to another application or document, you can save it directly to your existing OneNote notebooks for easy reference when you sit down to write a blog post or web page. The best part? Everything will be available on any device where you use OneNote.</p> \n <h3>2. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/awesome-screenshot-screen/nlipoenfbbikpbjkfpfillcgkoblgpmj?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">AwesomeScreenshot</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/awesomescreenshot-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=awesomescreenshot-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"AwesomeScreenshot Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 2M+</h4> \n <p>AwesomeScreenshot is a screen capture extension with capabilities for annotation and photo editing while staying in your browser. Once you take a screenshot of a selected area of your screen or an entire web page, you can crop, highlight, draw shapes, and blur sensitive information.</p> \n <h3>3. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/evernote-web-clipper/pioclpoplcdbaefihamjohnefbikjilc?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Evernote Web Clipper</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/evernote-web-clipper-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=evernote-web-clipper-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Evernote Web Clipper Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 3M+</h4> \n <p>Evernote is a note-taking and organization app that can be shared across teams for content collaboration. With the Evernote Web Clipper extension, users can save links onto a clipboard within their Evernote app for later reading and reference.</p> \n <h3>4. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/giphy-for-chrome/jlleokkdhkflpmghiioglgmnminbekdi?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Giphy for Chrome</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/giphy-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=giphy-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Giphy Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 300K+</h4> \n <p>Everyone loves <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/gif-websites\">animated GIFs</a>. They make emails, blogs, and social media posts engaging and funny, and with this extension, you can easily grab a GIF from Giphy's huge database for whatever content you're working on without navigating away.</p> \n <h3>5. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/sidebar-apps-and-bookmark/afdfpkhbdpioonfeknablodaejkklbdn/related?hl=en-US\">Sidebar</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/sidebar-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=sidebar-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Sidebar Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 20K+</h4> \n <p>Manually bookmarking websites can sometimes be a tedious process. Sidebar allows you to organize websites you want to save without having to open a new tab. Save websites to bookmarks, create folders, and add notes for later reference.</p> \n <h3>6. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/distill-web-monitor/inlikjemeeknofckkjolnjbpehgadgge\">Distill Web Monitor</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/distill-web-monito-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=distill-web-monito-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Distill Web Monitor Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 200K+</h4> \n <p>Distill Web Monitor allows you to keep track of changes to websites or articles that you’ve cited in your own work. That way, you can ensure that you’re providing the most up-to-date information to your readers and website visitors. You can also use it to simply track pages that you’re interested in citing in the future.</p> \n <h3>7. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/nimbus-screenshot-screen/bpconcjcammlapcogcnnelfmaeghhagj\">Nimbus Screenshot</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/nimbus-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=nimbus-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Nimbus Screenshot Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 1M+</h4> \n <p>Nimbus Screenshot is another screenshotting extension that will live within your browser, making it easier than ever to capture a partial or entire page. It will automatically save your screenshots to the cloud, ensuring that you don’t lose them.</p> \n <h3>8. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/libkey-nomad/lkoeejijapdihgbegpljiehpnlkadljb\">LibKey Nomad</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/libkey-nomad-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=libkey-nomad-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Libkey Nomad Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 200K+</h4> \n <p>For marketers and bloggers who work in technical or research-based industries, LibKey Nomad can be an extremely useful Chrome extension to have in your arsenal. The extension allows you to find, access, and source millions of scholarly articles based on the library that you primarily use.</p> \n <h3>9. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/video-downloader-professi/hcmifggiafbblnlgkeamfopdecenbcle\">Video Downloader Professional</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/video-downloader-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=video-downloader-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Video Downloader Pro Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 300K+</h4> \n <p>Do you need to source non-YouTube-based videos for your blog posts? Check out Video Downloader Professional, a Chrome extension that allows you to download videos from the internet. This is particularly useful if you find a video on Twitter, Facebook, or other external website where the embed code or original video link isn’t available.</p> \n <h3>10. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/google-scholar-button/ldipcbpaocekfooobnbcddclnhejkcpn\">Google Scholar Button</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/google-scholar-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=google-scholar-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Google Scholar Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 2M+</h4> \n <p>Google Scholar is another tool you can use if you write content in a technical, scientific, or otherwise research-heavy industry. You can find articles and books straight from the comfort of your browser. The tool sometimes links to the article’s landing page on a research website, and sometimes it links directly to the PDF. Either way, it’s a great way to streamline research so you don’t have to manually search for books and articles online.</p> \n <a></a> \n <h2>Chrome Extensions for Blogging</h2> \n <h3>1. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammarly-for-chrome/kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen?hl=en&amp;__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Grammarly</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/grammarly-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=grammarly-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Grammarly Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 10M+</h4> \n <p><a href=\"https://www.grammarly.com/\">Grammarly</a> is my go-to app for reviewing blog posts for proper spelling, grammar, and word use. You can drop large pieces of text into the desktop application for review, or you can use the handy Chrome extension to call out any grammar errors you're making while typing on the web.</p> \n <h3>2. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/google-dictionary-by-goog/mgijmajocgfcbeboacabfgobmjgjcoja?hl=en-US&amp;__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Google Dictionary</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/google-dictionary-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=google-dictionary-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Google Dictionary Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 3M+</h4> \n <p>Have you ever come across a word you're not familiar with while doing research online? Instead of Googling it in a separate tab, quickly highlight the word and click on the Google Dictionary extension to get the definition.</p> \n <h3>3. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/office-editing-for-docs-s/gbkeegbaiigmenfmjfclcdgdpimamgkj?__hstc=20629287.a51a184b1f4b68b5a109abeccb174b23.1628192355924.1630000442296.1630011805805.80&amp;__hssc=20629287.1.1630011805805&amp;__hsfp=4043529008\">Office Editing for Docs, Sheets &amp; Slides</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/office-editing-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=office-editing-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Office Editing Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: Not Published</h4> \n <p>For those times when you and your coworkers are working on computers with different operating systems, or want to collaborate on a live document together, check out Office Editing. This extension lets you easily drop Microsoft Office files into Google Drive to view and edit them without needing the software installed on your hard drive.</p> \n <h3>4. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/difree-distraction-free-t/dbcgoeihoopigakembbkkoobelpmpcnh\">Difree</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/difree-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=difree-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Difree Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 8</h4> \n <p>Sometimes it's hard to free yourself of distractions to write productively, especially if you're writing online. This new extension quickly opens a new tab for a clean and neutral text editor that auto-saves while you're working if you need a break from where you normally write.</p> \n <h3>5. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammar-and-spell-checker/oldceeleldhonbafppcapldpdifcinji\">LanguageTool</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/language-tool-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=language-tool-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Language Tool Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 1M+</h4> \n <p>LanguageTool is a useful Chrome extension for checking the existing text on a website and checking the grammar of your work as you write. It works in Google Docs and any website where there’s an active text box. It also works for different languages, so if you’re aiming to write for different markets and regions, you’ll most definitely want to add this tool to your arsenal.</p> \n <h3>6. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/wordtune-ai-powered-writi/nllcnknpjnininklegdoijpljgdjkijc\">Wordtune</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/wordtune-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=wordtune-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"WordTune Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 200K+</h4> \n <p>Wordtune is an AI-powered Chrome extension that provides several alternatives to what’s currently on the page. No matter what tool you’re using — whether it’s Google Docs, Outlook, or another text editor — you can highlight the sentence or phrase you’d like to rewrite, and Wordtune will provide several alternatives. After that, you only have to choose the one you like best.</p> \n <h3>7. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/prowritingaid-grammar-che/npnbdojkgkbcdfdjlfdmplppdphlhhcf\">ProWritingAid</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/prowritingaid-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=prowritingaid-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"ProWritingAid Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 200K+</h4> \n <p>ProWritingAid is another smart Chrome extension for checking the grammar, spelling, and clarity of your blog posts, web pages, and articles. Like the other tools on this list, it works with Google Docs and any text editor in your browser. It will catch any errors you make as you write and suggest corrections.</p> \n <h3>8. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/readme-text-to-speech-rea/npdkkcjlmhcnnaoobfdjndibfkkhhdfn\">Readme<img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/readme-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=1200&amp;name=readme-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"ReadMe Chrome extension\" width=\"1200\" style=\"width: 1200px;\" /></a></h3> \n <p>Users: 100K+</p> \n <p>Readme is a text-to-speech reader that works right within your Chrome browser to increase accessibility as you write or read articles. It can also help you listen to your drafts out loud for proofreading purposes. Listening to your writing can be an excellent way to catch errors.</p> \n <h3>9. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/helperbird-accessibility/ahmapmilbkfamljbpgphfndeemhnajme\">Helperbird</a></h3> \n <p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/helperbird-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=helperbird-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"Helperbird Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n <h4>Users: 20K+</h4> \n <p>Helperbird is an accessibility Chrome extension that can help writers with dyslexia, blindness, or other disabilities work more efficiently. You can change the font of the page, change the font sizes, use a magnifier, and turn text into speech. You can also turn pages and articles into a plain-text “Reader Mode” for easier reading and scanning.</p> \n <h3>10. <a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/mybib-free-citation-gener/phidhnmbkbkbkbknhldmpmnacgicphkf\">MyBib</a><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/mybib-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=mybib-chrome-extension.jpeg\" alt=\"MyBib Chrome extension\" width=\"650\" style=\"width: 650px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"><a href=\"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/mybib-free-citation-gener/phidhnmbkbkbkbknhldmpmnacgicphkf\" style=\"font-size: 1.5rem;\"></a></img></h3> \n <h4>Users: 800K+</h4> \n <p>Do you list citations in your blog posts and articles? Use the MyBib Chrome extension to create citations right within the browser. Simply travel to the page, Tweet, article, or video you’d like to cite, select the format you’d like to cite it in, and then copy and paste. Alternatively, if you’re collecting various sources, save it to a “Project.” You’ll then be able to download all of your works cited in any format you prefer.</p> \n <p>Bonus: It gives you an in-text citation, too. Absolutely brilliant.</p> \n <h2>More Chrome Extensions Equals More Productivity</h2> \n <p>Now that your browser is loaded with extensions to make marketing easier on a day-to-day basis, test them out to see what time and efficiencies you're able to save. When you're ready to work on your next piece of content, try all of the tools listed above to make the process less painful and time-intensive. Your team will thank you for it.</p> \n <p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally published in November 2016 and has been updated for comprehensiveness.</em></p> \n <a class=\"cta_button\" 8b65bd.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/language-tool-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&name=language-tool-chrome-extension.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn39@2020_2/2021/09/27/16-55-47-959_58b5112fef002679.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/wordtune-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&name=wordtune-chrome-extension.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn23@2020_6/2021/09/27/16-55-46-597_62b6ed182f0a6287.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/prowritingaid-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&name=prowritingaid-chrome-extension.jpeg":null,"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/readme-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=1200&name=readme-chrome-extension.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn64@2020_4/2021/09/27/16-55-47-672_72ab7af6a119d55c.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/helperbird-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&name=helperbird-chrome-extension.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn95@2020_6/2021/09/27/16-55-45-763_c0890ab0293d1c8d.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/mybib-chrome-extension.jpeg?width=650&name=mybib-chrome-extension.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn22@2020_3/2021/09/27/16-55-45-143_99f69ed7469ae28e.webp","https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/ea2e368c-706c-4d29-a75a-7271faf51b9d.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn86@2020_6/2021/09/27/16-55-48-156_eb773bb54dd36ef5.webp","https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/6f925317-c9c0-41d0-83bd-ef81bcb5d193.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn84@2020_5/2021/09/27/16-55-44-941_089e05bf316ad314.webp","https://track.hubspot.com/__ptq.gif?a=53&k=14&r=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.hubspot.com%2Fmarketing%2Fbest-chrome-extensions&bu=https%253A%252F%252Fblog.hubspot.com%252Fmarketing&bvt=rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn92@2020_2/2021/09/27/16-55-46-036_408ace9b6e38f302.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1632761741262},{"createdTime":"2021-09-28 00:55:41","updatedTime":"2021-09-28 00:55:41","title":"How to Calculate ROI in Marketing [Free Excel Templates]","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/how-to-prove-the-roi-of-your-marketing-slideshare","description":"<p>It's a brand new month, everyone! It's a time for new beginnings. New email campaigns, blog posts, and social media strategies are on the horizon.</p> \n<p>But, aren't we forgetting something? With last month's activities done, we need to pause for a second to examine what worked and what didn't. You can't do that just by saying last month's activities were \"great\" — because \"great\" doesn't pay the bills.</p> \n<p>If you can prove that your marketing activities actually made an impact on your business, you'll have many more opportunities at your disposal. More budget to play with, potential hires to bring on board, and more ideas to put in action. Sounds like every marketer's dream, right?</p> \n<p>So how do you go about first, finding the right metrics to use, and second, proving your marketing's ROI to your boss? Why, with a monthly marketing report template, of course. <a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template\"></a><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template?_ga=2.32816318.1492214109.1628615128-1283296022.1628615128\">Download our completely revamped PowerPoint and Excel templates by clicking here,</a> Keep reading to learn how you can calculate your ROI in marketing through Excel, and use them in real life.</p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=0d883e85-c2e5-49bb-bef2-bfddb500d84b&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; margin: 0 auto; display: block; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px\" alt=\"→ Free Download: Free Marketing Reporting Templates [Access Now]\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/0d883e85-c2e5-49bb-bef2-bfddb500d84b.png\" align=\"middle\"></a></p> \n<p><img alt=\"Marketing Reporting Templates\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-69-PM.png?width=615&amp;height=406&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-69-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"615\" height=\"406\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p></p> \n<p>For example, if you've been running a $800 campaign for three months, and you're seeing a average sales growth of 5% per month and $10000 sales growth from the previous month, then your ROI calculation can assess that trend: (10000 - (.05*10000) - 800)/800</p> \n<p>Additionally, if you're a HubSpot customer, you can<a href=\"https://knowledge.hubspot.com/articles/kcs_article/ads/configure-the-calculation-of-roi-for-paid-ad-campaigns?_ga=2.175636321.297321415.1563196412-1582690004.1559596502\"> </a><a href=\"https://knowledge.hubspot.com/articles/kcs_article/ads/configure-the-calculation-of-roi-for-paid-ad-campaigns?_ga=2.175636321.297321415.1563196412-1582690004.1559596502\">access an ROI calculator</a> programmed with the same formula in our <a href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/products/crm\">CRM</a>. But let’s go ahead and break down how it’s done in Excel for you with and without an existing sales trend.</p> \n<h2>How to Calculate ROI in Excel</h2> \n<p>Inputting formulas into Excel is a quick and easy way to solve any equation, and calculating return on investment can be done in a matter of seconds. For an equation without a pre-existing sales trend, the simple ROI equation can be plugged in with ease in Excel as follows: (Sales Growth - Marketing Cost)/Marketing Cost</p> \n<p>When you have the amount of sales growth collected and the amount it cost to market collected, plug in the variables into their own rows or columns. When completed, select a free cell to type in the formula using your data.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Excel calculation of simple ROI formula\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>With these steps completed, press “ENTER” and you’ll have your ROI calculated. If the formula doesn’t automatically calculate it as a percentage, make sure the outcome is recorded as such by selecting the Home Tab &gt; Number &gt; Percentage.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Completed calculation of simple ROI in Excel\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-23-PM.png?width=624&amp;height=160&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-23-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" height=\"160\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<h2>How to Calculate ROI in Marketing</h2> \n<p>Figuring out your return on investment with more factors — or more realistic outcomes — doesn’t have to be a tricky feat.</p> \n<p>For example, over a 12-month campaign, your team may identify an existing sales trend in organic growth and can use it to determine a more precise return on investment. Plug in this variable along with the original factors and input them using this ROI equation: (Sales Growth - Average Organic Sales Growth - Marketing Cost)/Marketing Cost</p> \n<p><img alt=\"ROI formula for marketing in Excel\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-25-PM.png?width=618&amp;height=248&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-25-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"618\" height=\"248\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>To compute the percentage, press “ENTER” and you’ll have a more precise ROI to base your marketing decisions on for the future.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Completed calculation of ROI for marketing in Excel\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-1.png?width=616&amp;height=254&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-1.png\" title=\"\" width=\"616\" height=\"254\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>Now that we’ve reviewed a couple of examples, let’s walk through how to use your data and how a HubSpot resource can make your marketing reporting a piece of cake.</p> \n<h2>Which Metrics Should You Track?</h2> \n<p>First things first — which metrics should you be paying attention to in the first place? Not all metrics were created equal, and if you're going to capture your boss' attention with this PowerPoint deck, you're going to need to tell your story efficiently through data. Click through our<a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template\"> </a><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template\">marketing metrics template</a> and get tips on how you can put together your marketing report deck.</p> \n<h2>How to Create Your Own Marketing Metrics Report</h2> \n<p>So now you know what metrics you need, but what about customizing the PowerPoint slides to fit your business? Follow these four steps so you'll have engaging, accurate, and concise slides to show to your boss.</p> \n<h3>1.<a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template\"> </a><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template\">Download our monthly marketing reporting templates for Excel and PowerPoint.</a></h3> \n<p><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template?_ga=2.104116352.1492214109.1628615128-1283296022.1628615128\"><img alt=\"How to Calculate ROI in Marketing Free Templates\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-37-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-37-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></a></p> \n<h3>2. Open up Excel, and fill in the metrics you want to track.</h3> \n<p>Equations and graphs will automatically populate based on the metrics you add.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"free monthly marketing reporting template\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-96-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-22-96-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<h3>3. Copy the graphs and paste them into PowerPoint.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"free marketing template graphs in PowerPoint\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-4.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-4.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<h3>4. Customize your graphs and charts to fit your company's theme.</h3> \n<p>After crunching a bunch of numbers, you probably need a little creative break anyway. Click on individual elements in the graph to customize them. If you really want to get fancy with your presentation,<a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/easy-powerpoint-design-tricks-ht\"> </a><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/easy-powerpoint-design-tricks-ht\">check out these five simple PowerPoint tips</a>.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"customized graphs from free monthly marketing templates in PowerPoint\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-25-14-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-25-14-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<h3>5. Add relevant examples to back up your graphs.</h3> \n<p>If you truly want to explain your marketing team's success from the past month, don't forget to include a slide here or there that touches on specific examples. For example, if you have a blog post that drove a crazy number of leads in a month, you could include that example slide with a few bullet-point takeaways after the \"Leads Generated by Marketing\" slide. These specific examples give color to your presentation and justify the time spent on future projects.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"PowerPoint featuring conclusions drawn from free monthly marketing reporting templates\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-3.png\" title=\"\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<h2>ROI Excel Templates</h2> \n<p>Excel is one of the best tools to use when tracking and calculating ROI regularly.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/monthly-marketing-reporting-template\">Download our monthly marketing reporting templates for Excel and PowerPoint.</a></h3> \n<p>In the above collection of marketing reporting templates, you'll get to fill in the following contents (and more) to suit your company:</p> \n<h3>1. Reach</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Excel template calculating marketing reach\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-24-77-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-24-77-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>In this template, you can calculate your marketing reach. For example, you can calculate the reach of your blog, email, or social media.</p> \n<p>Then, the graphs below will help turn your data into a visual graph.</p> \n<h3>2. Visits</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Graphs calculating website visits\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-84-PM.png?width=624&amp;height=368&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-84-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" height=\"368\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>With this template, you can calculate your visits. Leads</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Excel graph calculating marketing leads\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-40-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-40-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>In this template, you can input how many leads are generated with your marketing campaigns.</p> \n<p>In the graph below, you can visualize your leads depending on the sources.</p> \n<h3>4. Customers</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Excel graph for calculating customers\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-2.png?width=624&amp;height=308&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-2.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" height=\"308\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>In this template, you can calculate your customers via traffic source. In the below graph, you can visualize your customers.</p> \n<h3>5. Conversion Rates</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Excel template for calculating conversion rates\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-24-35-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-24-35-PM.png\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\"></p> \n<p>In this template, you can calculate conversion rates by inputting your information.</p> \n<h2>Keep Better Track of Your Marketing in Excel</h2> \n<p>Excel is a tool meant to help you in your business, and it’s an organized way to track your team's success. Make sure to use it to your advantage, and who knows, after a few months of this you may have a bigger budget or a brand new marketer on board.</p> \n<p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally bfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-84-PM.png?width=624&height=368&name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-84-PM.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn50@2020_2/2021/09/27/16-55-48-466_93239728b6f7b763.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-40-PM.png?width=624&name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-23-40-PM.png":null,"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-2.png?width=624&height=308&name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn45@2020_2/2021/09/27/16-55-44-708_adff85b4a22bd4e5.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-24-35-PM.png?width=624&name=How%20to%20Calculate%20ROI%20in%20Marketing%20%5BFree%20Excel%20Templates%5D-Aug-10-2021-05-05-24-35-PM.png":null,"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/3cb695d9-7dc5-4e70-8523-1e330e6bd58a.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn57@2020_6/2021/09/27/16-55-47-219_d6970030134c53c8.webp","https://track.hubspot.com/__ptq.gif?a=53&k=14&r=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.hubspot.com%2Fmarketing%2Fhow-to-prove-the-roi-of-your-marketing-slideshare&bu=https%253A%252F%252Fblog.hubspot.com%252Fmarketing&bvt=rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn38@2020_4/2021/09/27/16-55-44-734_cfbd157f5bbb6c62.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1632761741239},{"createdTime":"2021-09-28 00:55:41","updatedTime":"2021-09-28 00:55:41","title":"How to Make Instagram Story Highlights [+Engage Your Audience]","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/instagram-story-highlights","description":"<p>Did you know that <a href=\"https://embedsocial.com/blog/instagram-stories-analytics/\">⅓ of the most viewed Instagram Stories</a> are from businesses? Customers want to see what businesses are posting about on \"Stories,\" however, as you probably know, those are only viewable for 24 hours.</p> \n<p>But what if your audience wants to save those Stories and come back to them later (whether for a link or to reference something)? This is why Instagram added the \"Highlights\" feature several years ago.</p> \n<p></p> \n<p>With this tool, brands can save Stories so that customers can look at them whenever they want, indefinitely.</p> \n<p>In this post, we'll walk you through how to make an Instagram Story Highlight, and then dive into expert tips on how to use the feature to engage your audience.</p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=5e999bfc-f8b2-4ab7-96a8-c1467f450ca2&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; margin: 0 auto; display: block; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px\" alt=\"Click here to access a month's worth of Instagram tips &amp; free templates.\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/5e999bfc-f8b2-4ab7-96a8-c1467f450ca2.png\" align=\"middle\"></a></p> \n<p></p> \n<h3>1. Tap on the plus sign from your profile.</h3> \n<p>The first step in creating an Instagram Highlight is to tap on the plus sign in the top right corner of the screen when you're on your profile.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Instagram Story Highlights\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Make%20Instagram%20Story%20Highlights%20%5B+Engage%20Your%20Audience%5D-3.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\"></p> \n<h3>2. Select Story Highlight</h3> \n<p>Then, you'll want to select \"Story Highlight.\"</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Instagram Story Highlights\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Make%20Instagram%20Story%20Highlights%20%5B+Engage%20Your%20Audience%5D.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\"></p> \n<h3>3. Choose the Story you want to add.</h3> \n<p>At this point, it's time to choose what Stories you want to save to your highlight. You can choose one or several. Then, hit \"Next.\"</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Instagram Story Highlights\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Make%20Instagram%20Story%20Highlights%20%5B+Engage%20Your%20Audience%5D-2.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\"></p> \n<h3>4. Pick a cover photo and add a name for your highlight.</h3> \n<p>Lastly, you'll choose a cover photo and then add a name for your highlight. Then, click \"Add.\" To add more Stories over time, you can tap and hold the highlight and then select \"Edit Highlight.\"</p> \n<p>As time goes on and you want to reorder or archive your Instagram Story highlights, you can select \"Edit Highlight\" and then choose the Story you want to delete. Then, you can click on \"Edit Highlight,\" go to your Instagram Story archives and select the post again. This will now add that post again, making it at the front of your highlights thread.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Instagram Story Highlights\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Make%20Instagram%20Story%20Highlights%20%5B+Engage%20Your%20Audience%5D-1.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\"></p> \n<p>Once you've gone through these steps, your Instagram Story highlight will be visible on your profile. But, you might be wondering what picture you should use for your highlight cover/icon. Let's dive in below.</p> \n<h2>Instagram Story Highlights Cover</h2> \n<p>The last step of adding a highlight is selecting a name and image/icon. Visually, the best thing to do is create icons that are matching. For example, the HubSpot Academy Instagram account uses similar icons for its highlights.</p> \n<p>As you can see, the icons follow a certain format, are visually appealing, and match the theme of the rest of the feed.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"instagram story highlights icons\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/How%20to%20Make%20Instagram%20Story%20Highlights%20%5B+Engage%20Your%20Audience%5D.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\"></p> \n<p>Before you create your highlights in the app, it's important to choose the name and design the icons that you want.</p> \n<p>As you're designing the icons, you'll use square dimensions. It's actually very similar in size to the profile picture size. Make sure your icons have an aspect ratio of 1:1 and use dimensions like 2000 x 2000 pixels.</p> \n<p>Now that you know how to make an Instagram Story highlight, you might be wondering what the best practices are. Let's review some of the best ways you can use this feature to engage with your audience.</p> \n<p></p> \n<h3>1. Promote your products.</h3> \n<p>With Instagram highlights, you can promote your best-selling products. Perhaps you design an icon to look like your product, and then name it your product name. In that highlight, you can show reviews for specific products, photos, features, benefits, and more.</p> \n<p>Jenni Kim, a marketing manager at HubSpot, says, \"Brainstorm your highlights into the topics most relevant to what your audience is looking for to give an overview of what your social brand offers! The highlights act as a compilation or mini archive for your past stories, so it's a perfect way to showcase your past content in a way that's useful to your audience as they learn more about your brand.\"</p> \n<p>This is a great way to engage your audience on Instagram and increase the chances that your followers will purchase from you.</p> \n<h3>2. Add blog posts.</h3> \n<p>The best way to engage with your audience through highlights is to post engaging content that your followers want to come back to.</p> \n<p>For instance, you can add blog post links and save the most recent and relevant content on the highlight. This will help give your audience an easy place to access your top blog posts, even if they're reading the posts after you've already promoted them on social media.</p> \n<h3>3. Show interviews.</h3> \n<p>Another great way to engage with your audience through highlights is to post interviews with your employees, leadership, or customers. Or, if you post interview content on your blogs, you can film those interviews and save them to your interviews highlight. This will showcase your series and help you educate your audience.</p> \n<p>Interview content is typically very engaging because it's interesting while being informative. It gives a behind-the-scenes look at how others do what they do.</p> \n<h3>4. Reveal behind-the-scenes footage.</h3> \n<p>Speaking of behind the scenes, one of the best types of content to post on highlights is BTS footage. Whether you're an individual brand or a company, showing the behind-the-scenes footage is a fun way for customers to see how you do what you do. You can showcase behind-the-scenes footage of product production or of a photoshoot ad campaign.</p> \n<p>This type of footage is engaging and helps your audience connect with your brand. By saving this footage on your highlights, you'll extend the engagement and hopefully develop interested and long-term viewers who keep coming back for more.</p> \n<h3>5. Include events.</h3> \n<p>When it comes to promoting events, saving information on your Instagram highlights is a great way to make sure customers and followers have all the information they need at their fingertips.</p> \n<p>This helps engage the people who are attending your event (because they'll want to come back to this highlight for information) and promote the event to those who haven't heard of it (if people are looking at your profile, they'll see that you're having an event).</p> \n<h3>6. Save links.</h3> \n<p>Of course one of the top ways to get followers to purchase products from you on social media is to add links to your social media pages. If you're an influencer or company, you can save these most asked-for links to a highlight. This makes it easy for users to find a product from you and purchase it.</p> \n<h3>7. Showcase your culture.</h3> \n<p>Instagram highlights can be used to showcase fun, exciting video footage that reveals what your company culture is like. Perhaps you have someone on your culture team take videos of morale-boosting events.</p> \n<p>Or maybe you start a takeover series like HubSpot has on our HubSpot Life Instagram account. With this highlight, we engage our audience every day with a different employee takeover. This employee will basically post a \"day in the life\" on Stories that day and you can save those to your highlights for whenever people are researching what your company culture is like.</p> \n<h3>8. Answer FAQs.</h3> \n<p>When users have questions, they go to social media. A great way to engage those customers is to have a FAQ highlight where you discuss any/all the top questions that users ask.</p> \n<h3>9. Incorporate reviews and testimonials.</h3> \n<p>We all know that people purchase products that have great reviews and testimonials. In fact, it's one of the top elements that impact purchasing decisions. That's why it's a good idea to engage those users who are researching your product by looking at social media with a \"Reviews and Testimonials\" highlight.</p> \n<h3>10. Give tips/tricks.</h3> \n<p>Educating your audience is one of the best ways to provide value on social media. Save your tips and tricks to a highlight to continue educating and engaging with your audience on Instagram.</p> \n<h3>11. Display sales and discounts.</h3> \n<p>How do you get the word out about current sales and discounts? One way to do this is through Instagram story highlights. You can save all this information on a highlight so that customers know they can always check this highlight before making a purchase. Again, this keeps users coming back to your profile and engaging with your content.</p> \n<h3>12. Show case studies.</h3> \n<p>Depending on your product, people might want to see case studies or use cases for your product. When potential customers go online and look at your social media, that highlight will get them to click and see how other people are using your product or service.</p> \n<p>Instagram Story Highlights are a great way to keep important information easily accessible for your audience on your social media. With this feature, you can use your Stories (one of the most popular Instagram features) as a part of your long-term social media strategy.</p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=2db39870-e18b-4909-9c9e-8606903b35fb&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; \" alt=\"30 days of instagram\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/2db39870-e18b-4909-9c9e-8606903b35fb.png\"></a></p> \n<p></p>  \n<img
